basic.description: The electrophysiology and biophysics of neuronal and cardiac membranes; molecular biology, structure, and function of ion channels.  Students will learn to critically evaluate scientific literature.  Instructional format is primarily student-led seminars.  Enrolment is limited.  (Offered even years only; jointly with PHGY-424). Winter. N. Magoski. PREREQUISITES: PHGY-214 (or equivalent) with a minimum of 65 percent (or equivalent) or permission of the course supervisor.  EXCLUSION: PHGY-824*
basic.subject: BMED
basic.title: Ion Channels of Excitable Cells
